scripts.release:tag: node -e "const pkg = require('./packages/pushduck/package.json'); const tag = 'v' + pkg.version; const message = 'Release ' + tag; require('child_process').execSync('git add . && git commit -m "chore: release ' + tag + '" && git tag -a ' + tag + ' -m "' + message + '" && git push && git push --tags', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.release:manual: echo 'Manual release steps:' && echo '1. Update versions manually' && echo '2. Run: git tag -a v1.0.0 -m "Release v1.0.0"' && echo '3. Run: git push --tags'
